summary: This another attempt at fixing the 1st person view for H4lfD3ad\'s \"Better Shrouded Armor\".
descriptionHtml:
This fix is for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12015]Better Shrouded Armor by Half-Dead[/url] 

The main mod, is missing the meshes for 1st person view. It shows up as default DB armor textures. (refer to images)

[b][color=green]To install, just open the zip file, drop \"meshes\" folder into your skyrim / \"Data\" folder. 

Or use Nexus Mod Manager.[/color][/b]

[color=orange]Credits goes to H4lfD3ad for his amazing dark brotherhood armor. Of course, you need to install his mod first in order for this to work. [/color]

[color=grey][i]dave_rayner87 also made an esp fix [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16025]here[/url].
But for those that were having \"invisible arms\" problem, or couldn\'t get it to work, try mines. [/i][/color]
author: Scepth
